name: ArtifactVersionPolicyCodes
title: Artifact Version Policy Codes
description: The versioning policy of an artifact (metadata, strict)

concept.definition: A versioning policy that allows non-substantive changes to the metadata elements of an artifact without requiring a change to the value of the version element.

A versioning policy that indicates that any change to the content of an artifact, including non-substantive and metadata changes, requires a change to the value of the version element of the artifact.
